items.title: Avalanche avoids crypto market drop with a 10% AVAX price pump: Here’s why

title.en: Avalanche avoids crypto market drop with a 10% AVAX price pump: Here’s why
title.pt: Avalanche avoids crypto market drop with a 10% AVAX price pump: Here’s why

data.summary:
1. **Regulatory Developments**: US Senator Elizabeth Warren proposed a market structure bill aimed at addressing crypto ATM scams, while the White House targets passing a crypto market structure bill by year-end.

2. **Bitcoin Trends**: Bitcoin (BTC) saw a dip, attracting buyers, but charts suggest a potential price purge to $106K. Meanwhile, profit-taking metrics indicate the Bitcoin bull cycle may be entering its late phase.

3. **Market Movements**: A $1.25 billion Bitcoin futures flush raised questions about market implications. Despite a broader crypto market drop, Avalanche (AVAX) surged by 10%, bucking the trend.

4. **Industry Updates**: Trump-backed World Liberty Financial plans to launch a debit card, adding to the growing crypto payment solutions.
